welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kisumu, the vibrant and charming city on the shores of Lake Victoria. Known for its stunning sunsets, rich culture, and bustling markets, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kisumu has to offer during your stay. Karibu! (Welcome!)

restaurants.name: Sovereign Hotel
restaurants.description: Sovereign Hotel is a diner located in the city.

restaurants.name: Jomo Kenyatta Grounds
restaurants.description: Jomo Kenyatta Grounds is a african restaurant located in Kisumu.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kisumu Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kisumu Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
